template.name: RegisterCorruption

query.formula: // Checks that it is possible for the VM to finish execution.

// Checks if it is possible to be authenticated (170 for HB).
// Checks if it is possible to be undetected and authenticated.
// Checks if it is possible to not decrease the number of tries (PTC) when failed.
